Brittanie's Thyme Organic Balancing Facial Toner

Brand: Brittanie's Thyme

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: ,DISTILLED AQUA (WATER), ORGANI HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) WATER, ORGANIC ROSA DAMASCENA (ROSE) FLOWER WATER, ORGANIC MENTHA PIPERITA (PEPPERMINT) OIL, ORGANIC CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (SWEET ORANGE) OIL
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
